#### The published [paper](https://www.nature.com/articles/srep39670) is available on-line.

We developed a series of field surveys and experiments to explore why algal growth was being surprised on coral reefs off the Caribbean coast of Panama. We found that the abundance of small-bodied herbivores was high enough to control algal growth and prevent algal dominance.
